review: Ok plug in stick to tv,,,,, then into the wall(I don't think anybody mentioned that in the commercials).  Starts up easy enough.  Log in to prime account ok.  Instructional video on how to use remote and how to plug in the stick(useless).  Lets watch a show on Amazon prime....stuttering loading...stick is giving me the option to do something else instead.  No, I am watching this show.  It stutters for a couple more minutes then completes whatever buffering procedure and we finish watching the show just fine.  My xbox 360 does this alot smoother.Ok lets try something else...  Lets mirror my computer (win 8) to the tv.  that sounds awesome.  Attempting to connect...  goes on for 20 minutes.  Lets do some research....  Ok, noone can do this....  maybe at some later date but not now....  sigh.Ok lets try something else...  I have a kindle hd  lets try mirroring that....  Nope...  HDX or Kindle phone only....  Damn....Ok lets try something else....  I will use my kindle as a remote.. there is an app and everything  should be easy.  Connecting....success!  Ok lets swipe through the menu.....why isn't it working.....ok no swiping..... to move the menu right, drag finger left to right.  Why is this the opposite of the kindle menu?!At this point I come to the realization that I would only use this device on my secondary tv and rarely at that.  I have a small brick.  At least until some software gets updated.
